comment:
Had this at a friend’s apartment. Very good combination of peat and sherry cask goodness.


Nose: Peat, Iodine, Chocolate, Caramel, Salt, Almonds, Raisins, Citrus, Baking Spices, Flowers

Palate: Raisins, peat, chocolate, cherry, salt, Pepper

Finish: potato chips, raisin, chocolate, flowers, apricot, cherry
